abstract: In contrast to its peers, Well Fargo made $430 million in net gains from trading activities in the fourth quarter, compared with a $442 million loss in the third quarter.
snippet: In contrast to its peers, Well Fargo made $430 million in net gains from trading activities in the fourth quarter, compared with a $442 million loss in the third quarter.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street banks reporting poor trading results might want to take some tips from Wells Fargo & Company.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Stands Out With Trading Gains
